welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Highbury, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its picturesque streets, historic landmarks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Highbury has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private jet passengers, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves all commercial flights and provides a variety of amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities for VIP passengers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly SkyTeam airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mainly British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then a fee applies for longer use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Luton Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Terminal 1 at Luton Airport is a dedicated terminal for low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles mainly European flights and some long-haul flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles mainly domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
